description: Creates an application. An application consists of one or more server groups. Each server group contain one or more servers.

parameters.name: serverGroups
parameters.description: The server groups to include in the application. (dict) --- Logical grouping of servers. serverGroupId (string) --- The ID of a server group. name (string) --- The name of a server group. serverList (list) --- The servers that belong to a server group. (dict) --- Represents a server. serverId (string) --- The ID of the server. serverType (string) --- The type of server. vmServer (dict) --- Information about the VM server. vmServerAddress (dict) --- The VM server location. vmManagerId (string) --- The ID of the VM manager. vmId (string) --- The ID of the VM. vmName (string) --- The name of the VM. vmManagerName (string) --- The name of the VM manager. vmManagerType (string) --- The type of VM management product. vmPath (string) --- The VM folder path in the vCenter Server virtual machine inventory tree. replicationJobId (string) --- The ID of the replication job. replicationJobTerminated (boolean) --- Indicates whether the replication job is deleted or failed.

nested_params.name: serverGroupId
nested_params.description: The ID of a server group.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of a server group.

nested_params.name: serverList
nested_params.description: The servers that belong to a server group.

nested_params.name: vmManagerId
nested_params.description: The ID of the VM manager.

nested_params.name: vmManagerName
nested_params.description: The name of the VM manager.

nested_params.name: vmManagerType
nested_params.description: The type of VM management product.

nested_params.name: vmPath
nested_params.description: The VM folder path in the vCenter Server virtual machine inventory tree.

nested_params.name: replicationJobId
nested_params.description: The ID of the replication job.

nested_params.name: replicationJobTerminated
nested_params.description: Indicates whether the replication job is deleted or failed.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags to be associated with the application. (dict) --- Key/value pair that can be assigned to an application. key (string) --- The tag key. value (string) --- The tag value.

nested_items.description: A summary description of the application.

nested_items.description: The timestamp of the application's most recent successful replication.

nested_items.description: The latest time that this application was launched successfully.

nested_items.name: roleName

nested_items.description: The number of server groups present in the application.

nested_items.description: The number of servers present in the application.
